# Modify the Default App Clip Experience of an App Store Version

**Web Service Endpoint**

Update the relationship between an App Store version and a default App Clip experience.

## Attaching a Default App Clip Experience to a Version

- **Get the Default App Clip Experience for an App Store Version**: Get the default App Clip experience for an App Store version of your app.
- **Get the Default App Clip Experiences Resource ID for an App Store Version**: Get the ID of an app’s related default App Clip experience.
